name: simple
description: Simplest possible use of Node.js and Docker.

scripts.docker:run: docker run -p 3000:3000 -d --name=helloworld -e NEW_RELIC_LICENSE_KEY=API_KEY -e NEW_RELIC_LOG_LEVEL=trace  -e NEW_RELIC_APP_NAME="helloworld_nodejs" helloworld
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop helloworld && docker rm helloworld
scripts.docker:remove-all: docker rm --force $(docker ps -a -q) && docker rmi --force $(docker images -q)

author: ashley@codecapers.com.au
